mapper.select: SELECT ip_info AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM nb_log WHERE ip_info != '未知' AND ip_info != '' GROUP BY ip_info LIMIT 10

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(l.time, '%Y-%m-%d') as item, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM nb_log l WHERE DATE_FORMAT(l.time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND l.url NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', '/management/', '%') AND l.url NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', '/upfiles/', '%') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(l.time, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY l.time DESC
SELECT browser AS name, COUNT(1) as value FROM nb_log WHERE browser != 'Unknown' GROUP BY browser
select count(1) from nb_log l where DATE_FORMAT(l.time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(curdate(), '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.delete: delete from nb_log where TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, time, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) >= 31
